title: The Portrait of a Lady - "a thousand...zigzags"

content.question: The phrase “a thousand ridiculous zigzags” (third sentence before end) most likely refers to Isabel Archer’s

choices.label: exertions on behalf of her friends
practice of probing deeply into minutiae

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
